医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
CRISPR 传递的突破有望实现更安全的基因编辑PNAS 的最新研究强调了 CRISPR-Cas 系统的非病毒、细胞特异性递送方法的进展，强调了它们通过最大限度地减少与脱靶效应相关的风险和改善靶向递送来增强研究和基因治疗应用的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Breakthrough-in-CRISPR-delivery-promises-safer-gene-editing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Breakthrough-in-CRISPR-delivery-promises-safer-gene-editing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf0c4091-92d5-4112-b1d2-e82e2e4ad637 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 19:08:00 -0500 Breakthrough in CRISPR delivery promises safer gene editing
研究表明，当前的人工智能程序在识别有色人种皮肤病变方面表现较差人工智能 (AI) 程序最近在皮肤科领域广泛流行，用于评估、诊断和治疗皮肤状况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Current-AI-programs-do-worse-at-identifying-skin-lesions-in-people-of-color-research-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Current-AI-programs-do-worse-at-identifying-skin-lesions-in-people-of-color-research-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bbbe673b-8608-411d-a5e0-26a3002a40eb Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:29:43 -0500 Current AI programs do worse at identifying skin lesions in people of color, research shows
DNA 定制饮食有助于控制血糖并降低 2 型糖尿病进展的风险英国的一项试验发现，针对高危人群的 DNA 定制饮食有助于控制血糖并降低进展为 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/DNA-tailored-diet-could-help-manage-blood-glucose-and-reduce-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/DNA-tailored-diet-could-help-manage-blood-glucose-and-reduce-risk-of-type-2-diabetes-progression.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2c7994e9-6ee7-4dfc-8435-ab14b38dceb9 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:23:51 -0500 DNA-tailored diet could help manage blood glucose and reduce risk of type 2 diabetes progression
国情咨文……很忙尽管国会竞相完成去年 10 月开始的财政年度逾期的支出法案，但总统乔·拜登仍在努力制定他的第二任期的健康议程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/The-state-of-the-union-is-e280a6-busy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/The-state-of-the-union-is-e280a6-busy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e842f34-f6b1-45b1-99b3-0f624e36f20f Thu, 07 Mar 2024 15:18:54 -0500 The state of the union is … busy
揭示多病患者从出生到死亡的典型疾病轨迹在《npj Digital Medicine》最近发表的一项研究中，复杂性科学中心的研究人员分析了奥地利 4400 万次住院的综合数据集。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Unraveling-典型-疾病-trajectories-in-multimorbid-病人-from-birth-to-death.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Unraveling-典型-疾病-trajectories-in-multimorbid-病人-from-birth-to-death.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98bc6efc-7bb1-4c97-bb5f-a6353dc983eb Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:43:16 -0500 Unraveling typical disease trajectories in multimorbid patients from birth to death
神经科学家将视觉感知的变化与步行节奏联系起来神经科学家首次在我们的视觉感知变化与行走时的脚步节奏之间建立了联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Neuroscientists-link-visual-perception-shifts-to-walking-rhythm.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Neuroscientists-link-visual-perception-shifts-to-walking-rhythm.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c86647ec-2f53-46d6-986e-ac346c016668 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:37:18 -0500 Neuroscientists link visual perception shifts to walking rhythm
遗传因素可能预测儿童癌症幸存者患新癌症的风险升高美国国立卫生研究院下属国家癌症研究所 (NCI) 的研究人员领导的一项研究表明，预测一般人群癌症风险的常见遗传因素也可能预测儿童癌症幸存者患新癌症的风险升高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Inherited-genic-factors-may-predict-elevated-risk-of-new-cancers-among-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Inherited-genic-factors-may-predict-elevated-risk-of-new-cancers-among-childhood-cancer-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=151706b5-748f-4d57-a4c0-36f6f2fc49e4 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:31:02 -0500 Inherited genetic factors may predict elevated risk of new cancers among childhood cancer survivors
新动画系列推出，以提高家长对早产儿大脑发育的了解儿科神经影像小组首席研究员 Caroline Hartley 教授和博士后研究员 Marianne van der Vaart 博士今天推出了一系列动画，旨在提高家长对早产儿大脑发育及其影响的了解。它与呼吸和呼吸暂停（呼吸停止）有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/New-animation-series-launched-to-improve-parental-understanding-of-brain-development-in-premature-infants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/New-animation-series-launched-to-improve-parental-understanding-of-brain-development-in-premature-infants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c8f40a71-2d05-4a38-9086-1f135596fc49 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:16:42 -0500 New animation series launched to improve parental understanding of brain development in premature infants
研究表明农村老年人死亡率较高与挪威城市人手不足有关居住在挪威农村地区的老年人如果出院到病人太多且护理人员缺乏提供服务的城市，死亡率会更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Study-links-higher-mortality-among-rural-elderly-to-understaffed-Norwegian-municipalities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Study-links-higher-mortality-among-rural-elderly-to-understaffed-Norwegian-municipalities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=edceffa3-6027-44e4-9670-9e595bdc636d Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:09:50 -0500 Study links higher mortality among rural elderly to understaffed Norwegian municipalities
钓鱼治疗 PTSD 的研究获得 130 万美元资助研究人员已获得“改变游戏规则”的 130 万美元现金注入，以探索医生是否可以通过钓鱼来治疗 PTSD。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Research-on-fishing-as-PTSD-treatment-gets-a-2413-million-funding-boost.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240307/Research-on-fishing-as-PTSD-treatment-gets-a-2413-million-funding-boost.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08f0ac61-39f5-4322-87de-fff0f6dd1395 Thu, 07 Mar 2024 14:03:17 -0500 Research on fishing as PTSD treatment gets a $1.3 million funding boost
